title: Halo Infinite
description: Master Chief returns to confront his most ruthless foe yet on the mysterious Zeta Halo. Experience an expansive open-world adventure combined with the classic tight arena combat that defined the series.

title: Forza Horizon 5
description: Explore the vibrant and ever-evolving open-world landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action in hundreds of the world’s greatest cars. Features stunning biomes from living deserts to lush jungles.

title: Gears 5
description: Kait Diaz breaks away to uncover her connection to the enemy and discovers the true danger to Sera – herself. Features a deep campaign, brutal multiplayer, and the intense Escape mode.

title: Starfield
description: In this next-generation role-playing game set amongst the stars, create any character you want and explore with unparalleled freedom as you embark on an epic journey to answer humanity’s greatest mystery.

title: Sea of Thieves
description: The quintessential pirate experience, from sailing and fighting to exploring and looting—everything you need to live the pirate life and become a legend in your own right.
